mapper.sql: id, user_id, code, school_id, flag, info
mapper.select:
SELECT UBI.*, TEI.id tid, TEI.code, TEI.info tinfo, SCI.id sid, SCI.name sname, SCI.code scode ,CASE UBI.power WHEN 0 THEN '数据管理员' WHEN 1 THEN '校园管理员' WHEN 2 THEN '教师' WHEN 3 THEN '学生' END AS roleName FROM user_basic_info AS UBI, school_administrator AS TEI, school_info AS SCI WHERE UBI.flag = 0 AND TEI.flag = 0 AND SCI.flag = 0 AND UBI.id = TEI.user_id AND SCI.id = TEI.school_id AND UBI.power = 1
AND SCI.id = #{schoolId}
AND UBI.[name] LIKE '%'+#{name}+'%'
AND TEI.[code] LIKE '%'+#{code}+'%'
AND UBI.[mail] LIKE '%'+#{mail}+'%'
AND UBI.[phone] LIKE '%'+#{phone}+'%'
ORDER BY
UBI.[${order}]
TEI.code
ASC
DESC

SELECT UBI.id, TI.id as rid FROM user_basic_info UBI LEFT JOIN user_login_info ULI ON ULI.user_id = UBI.id LEFT JOIN school_administrator TI ON TI.user_id = UBI.id WHERE UBI.flag = 0 AND TI.flag = 0 AND ${sqlWhere} ;
